DOC.brief_title: Post-abortion Care Contraceptive Counselling Midwives Physicians
DOC.detailed_description: The project take place Jaramogi Oginga Odinga Teaching Referral Hospital ( JOOTRH ) Kisumu East District Hospital ( KEDH ) , Kisumu County Nyanza Province Western Kenya . The project implement within Department Obstetrics Gynaecology two facility . Altogether two facility admit around 60 woman per month incomplete abortion . Midwives physician include project undergo standardize training prior study . This include basic knowledge treatment incomplete abortion post abortion contraceptive counsel well interview technique . The training theoretical practical on-going project order cover / new staff . The sample size calculate objective show two-sided equivalence , assume overall complication rate could high 4-5 percent would apply types provider . To demonstrate two-sided equivalence within margin 4-5 percent 80 % power use 95 % CI ( Î±=0.05 ) , 816 woman would need recruit . In addition , 10 percent could expect lost follow adjust . Thus , total 880 woman recruit . The randomization conduct block 8 vary randomly . A computer random number generator use generate list code 1 880 code link one two group - A= PAC care misoprostol midwife B= PAC care misoprostol physician . The list use sequentially numbered , opaque , seal envelope prepare research team . Each envelope contain study protocol individual woman . At time allocation , research assistant clinic pick envelope low number , write participant 's name personal registration number , open . Process evaluation conduct intermittent check-ups order assure intervention procedure perform correctly follow protocol . The check-ups make researcher include review complete protocols repetition education physicians midwife involve study . All eligible woman consent participation undergo clinical assessment provider randomize . The clinical assessment include ( ) medical history taking , Last Menstrual Period ( LMP ) , Obstetric Gynaecological history , contraceptive history , symptom ) ( ii ) General physical examination ( pulse , blood pressure temperature ) ; ( iii ) Pelvic examination include examination size uterus ( External genitalia , speculum examination , Bimanual examination ) . Before discharge woman give detailed information regard bleed pain expect follow treatment well abnormal symptom ( fever , foul smell vaginal discharge ) importance seek care symptom occur . All woman followed-up 7 - 10 day . All analyse Intention Treat ( ITT ) . Background characteristic two study group categorical outcome present use descriptive statistic . Differences group analyse use relative risk ( 95 % CI ) . P-values equal low 0.05 consider statistically significant .
